name: turf-www
description: create the turf website and online documentation

scripts.deploy: npm run buildAPI && npm run copyAssets && npm run moveDocFile && npm run deleteDocDirectory
scripts.buildAPI: documentation build -c documentation.yml turf/packages/turf-*/index.js -t template/turf_2017 -f html -o docs
scripts.serveAPI: documentation serve -c documentation.yml turf/packages/turf-*/index.js -t template/turf_2017 -f html -o docs -w
